info.title: Project Idea API
info.description: REST API for Project Idea Platform

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: APIs for user authentication and registration

tags.name: Users
tags.description: APIs for user management and users operations

tags.name: Surveys
tags.description: APIs for creating and managing surveys

tags.name: Social Profiles
tags.description: APIs for managing user social profiles

tags.name: Posts
tags.description: APIs for managing all types of posts

tags.name: Survey Responses
tags.description: APIs for submitting and analyzing survey responses

get.description: Retrieve a specific user's information by their UUID

put.description: Update a user's information. Requires ADMIN role.

delete.description: Delete a user from the system. Requires ADMIN role.

get.description: Retrieve the information of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update all fields of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Update specific fields of the currently authenticated user

patch.summary: Partially update current user's social profile

post.summary: Pin a post in the thread

delete.summary: Unpin a post from the thread

post.description: Submit a response to an open ended survey
Submit a response to a multiple choice survey

get.description: Retrieve all attachments for a specific project

post.description: Upload a file attachment to a project. Max file size: 10MB. Allowed file types: PDF, JPEG, PNG, GIF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, TXT

get.summary: Get applications for an inquiry (only for inquiry author)

post.description: Authenticate a user with email and password to receive a JWT token

patch.description: Upload a new avatar image for the current user's profile. Supports JPG, PNG, and GIF formats up to 5MB.

patch.summary: Upload or update post featured image

get.description: Retrieves a paged list of all users. Requires ADMIN authority.
Retrieves all threads where the user is either the author or has posts
Retrieve a paginated list of all social profiles

get.summary: Get user's public profile by username

get.description: Search for social profiles by name, surname, or username

get.summary: Get response statistics for a multiple choice survey
Get suggested posts based on user type

get.description: Search for posts with filters and pagination

get.summary: Get moderation actions for a user
Get moderation actions for a post

delete.summary: Delete an open ended survey response
Delete a multiple choice survey response

delete.description: Delete a specific attachment from a project

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong

interests.description: Set of category IDs representing user's interests

items.description: Set of category IDs representing user's interests

bio.example: Software developer passionate about creating great user experiences

additionalProperties.description: Map of platform names to profile URLs

links.description: Map of platform names to profile URLs

description.description: Description of the role's permissions and responsibilities
description.example: Moderator role with content management privileges

RoleCreateDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new role

title.example: I’m thinking of creating a cloud rental platform. Any ideas or suggestions?

description.example: Imagine renting a cloud to make it rain right over the house of someone who annoys you. Fun, right?

threadId.description: Optional thread ID to associate with this survey

featured.description: Whether this survey should be featured

language.description: Optional language override (ISO 639-1 code). If not provided, user's preferred language will be used

allowMultipleAnswers.description: For multiple choice surveys: whether multiple options can be selected

isOpenEnded.description: Type of survey: true for open-ended, false for multiple choice

options.description: List of options for multiple choice surveys

items.description: List of options for multiple choice surveys

CategoryCreateDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for creating a new category

description.example: A collection of cloud computing related projects and ideas

response.description: User's text response to the open-ended survey question
response.example: This is my detailed response to the survey question

selectedOptions.description: List of selected options from the survey choices

items.description: List of selected options from the survey choices

featured.description: Whether this project should be featured

language.description: Optional language override (ISO 639-1 code). If not provided, user's preferred language will be used

threadId.description: Optional thread ID to associate with this project

orderIndex.description: Order index of the step in the roadmap

linkedPostId.description: ID of linked post (Fundraiser or Inquiry)

description.example: We need a senior backend developer to build a robust backend system...

threadId.description: Optional thread ID to associate with this inquiry

featured.description: Whether this inquiry should be featured

message.example: I am interested in this position and believe I am a great fit for the role.

description.example: We need your help to make this happen!

threadId.description: Optional thread ID to associate with this fundraiser

featured.description: Whether this fundraiser should be featured

language.description: Optional language override (ISO 639-1 code). If not provided, user's preferred language will be used

username.description: Unique username for the account. If not provided, will be auto-generated

email.description: User's email address. Must be unique in the system

password.description: User's password. Will be encrypted before storage

interests.description: Set of category IDs representing user's interests

items.description: Set of category IDs representing user's interests

bio.example: Software developer passionate about creating great user experiences

additionalProperties.description: Map of platform names to profile URLs

links.description: Map of platform names to profile URLs

description.example: Help us improve our services by providing your feedback

categories.description: Updated set of category IDs for the survey

items.description: Updated set of category IDs for the survey

allowMultipleAnswers.description: Whether multiple options can be selected in a multiple choice survey

featured.description: Whether the survey should be featured

active.description: Whether the survey is currently active

options.description: Updated list of options for multiple choice surveys

items.description: Updated list of options for multiple choice surveys

featured.description: Whether this project should be featured
Whether this inquiry should be featured
Whether this fundraiser should be featured
